Text Editor

An application that lets you work with just about any Programming Language or Lightweight Text Formatting Language.

As a geek, your text editor is your most important tool. Pick one or two, and really get to know it. I donâ€™t care if you choose Emacs , Neovim , VS Code , or whatever else. Learn how to use it. Really get the hang of your editing environment. Being more skilled with your tools will make it easier for you to get work done. And geek play, of course.
